price: Ne e caktojmë vdekjen tuaj dhe askush nuk mund të na pengojë
arabic: نَحۡنُ قَدَّرۡنَا بَيۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu qaddarnā baynakumu al-mawta wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
